name: Never Alone v0.1
description:
Designed for the Wonderville Social Distancing Game Jam. Thanks so much for hosting the jam! I had a great time designing all the different rooms and setting the lighting for the scene. 

Objective: You wake up in the middle of the night and you want a cup of water, but you're not supposed to leave your room. Find a cup and fill it with water before going back to bed. 

Note: If you get locked somewhere or you're not sure what to do, there may be a bug where you accidentally locked yourself into a room, so just restart and try again. Feel free to leave a comment if that happens or any other bugs occur!

Participants: Andrew Hsu, Stoew34, Zassimo(sfx!)

Used asset packs from the Unity store and a prebuilt FPS controller.

Build 0.1 Notes:

-Currently there is no menu set up, so if you want to restart or if there is a bug, you'll have to restart the application. 

-Some doors don't have interactability yet and you can just phase right through them (two doors specifically), so you may want to try each door.

-There IS a way to technically win but due to time constraints, it doesn't show it. This will be included in the next build.

If you want to let me know of any bugs, please comment below!

***********************

Platform: PC (Sorry Mac users!)

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Run - Shift + WASD

Interact - Left mouse click

Zoom - Right mouse click

Crouch - Ctrl

Jump - Space
